name: FCEUX Save State File
summary: Learn about .FC1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: FCEUX uses ascending file extensions, such as "fc1", "fc2", and "fc3", to save game states.
FCEUX is an advanced version of the FCE Ultra emulator. It is designed to provide functions from different FCE Ultra branches, such as FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, and FCEUXDSP.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
